$id: AL-Go for GitHub Repo Settings File
title: AL-Go for GitHub Repo Settings File
description: Schema for AL-Go for GitHub Repo Settings File

type.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the type of project. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#type

templateUrl.description: Repo Setting. URL to the GitHub repository template for this repository. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#templateUrl

runs-on.description: Repo Setting. Specifies which GitHub runner is used to run non-build jobs. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#runs-on

shell.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the shell to use for non-build jobs. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#shell

githubRunner.description: Repo Setting. Specifies which GitHub runner is used to run build jobs. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#githubRunner

githubRunnerShell.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the shell to use for build jobs. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#githubRunnerShell

useProjectDependencies.description: Repo Setting. Specifies whether the project dependencies should be used to setup multi-stage build jobs. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#useProjectDependencies

currentSchedule.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the schedule for the next major test builds in crontab format (see https://crontab.guru/). Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#currentSchedule

nextMinorSchedule.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the schedule for the next major test builds in crontab format (see https://crontab.guru/). Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#nextMinorSchedule

nextMajorSchedule.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the schedule for the next major test builds in crontab format (see https://crontab.guru/). Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#nextMajorSchedule

CICDSchedule.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the schedule for the next major test builds in crontab format (see https://crontab.guru/). Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#CICDSchedule

UpdateGitHubGoSystemFilesSchedule.description: Repo Setting. Set a schedule for running Update AL-Go System Files recurringly (Auto-Update) in crontab format (see https://crontab.guru/). Note that you need to run Update AL-Go System Files in order for this setting to take effect. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#updateGitHubGoSystemFilesSchedule

unusedALGoSystemFiles.description: Repo Setting. An array of filenames for unused AL-Go System Files. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#unusedALGoSystemFiles

projects.description: Repo Setting. An array of project folders. By Default AL-Go for GitHub will enumerate all folders from the root and 2 levels deep to discover projects. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#projects

repoVersion.description: Repo Setting. The Repository Version Number (Major.Minor). Repository version number will be part of build artifacts naming. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#repoVersion

repoName.description: Repo Setting. The Repository Name (to override the actual repository name in artifacts naming). See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#repoName

environments.description: Repo Setting. An array of environments to use for Deployment. Environments can also be specified in GitHub Environments. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#environments

CICDPushBranches.description: Repo Setting. An array of branches, which will trigger a CI/CD workflow to be run after commit. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#CICDPushBranches

CICDPullRequestBranches.description: Repo Setting. An array of branches, which will trigger a CI/CD workflow to be run after a pull request is created. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#CICDPullRequestBranches

buildModes.description: Repo Setting. An array of build modes. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#buildModes

cacheImageName.description: Repo Setting. The prefix of the Docker image to use for caching on self-hosted GitHub Runners. Default is 'my'. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#cacheImageName

cacheKeepDays.description: Repo Setting. The number of days to keep an unused Docker image for caching on self-hosted GitHub Runners. Default is 3. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#cacheKeepDays

alwaysBuildAllProjects.description: Repo Setting. Specifies whether all projects should be built even if there are no changes. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#alwaysBuildAllProjects

partnerTelemetryConnectionString.description: Repo Setting. Specifies the connection string for your application insights account to capture telemetry for your AL-Go repositories. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#partnerTelemetryConnectionString

sendExtendedTelemetryToMicrosoft.description: Repo Setting. Specifies whether extended telemetry should be sent to Microsoft for troubleshooting purposes. See https://aka.ms/ALGoSettings#sendExtendedTelemetryToMicrosoft
